dict.string: MileageTracker uses the microphone for voice-first trip logging so you can record trips hands-free while driving.
MileageTracker uses speech recognition to understand your voice commands for logging trips hands-free.
MileageTracker uses your location to detect when you arrive at a destination so it can prompt you to log your ending odometer reading.
MileageTracker monitors your location in the background to detect arrival at destinations and prompt for ending odometer readings.
MileageTracker uses the camera to photograph your odometer for start-of-year and end-of-year records.
